attributes.action: prevent and refuse David Lynch persuading our teachers to use transcendental meditation with our pupils in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transcendental meditation is a cult based religion practice.


We do not want our children taking mediatin classes in schools.

The school environment is for learning and not imposing one's religious beliefs on pupils. 

I petiton the prime minister to prevent this from happening in our schools.
